data.lyric:
[ti:Nowadays (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Skies/Landon Cube]
[al:Life of a Dark Rose]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Nowadays (如今) (Explicit) - Lil Skies/Landon Cube
[00:01.34]Lil Skies：
[00:01.91]CashMoneyAP
[00:03.28]
[00:22.59]Aye aye aye
[00:24.06]Both：
[00:24.51]Nowadays I'm too cool for a girlfriend
[00:27.51]Nowadays I don't know when the world spins
[00:30.48]Live your life like we die when the world ends
[00:33.32]So it's alright every time we f**kin' break a sin
[00:36.12]
[00:36.72]Nowadays sh*t's not the same
[00:39.11]Life switched lanes now these hoes act strange
[00:41.93]And I lost my grip on the world in bliss
[00:44.64]It's so it's so
[00:46.62]Lil Skies：
[00:47.19]Aye it's so lonely on the east side
[00:48.99]I don't give a f**k I keep it real I'm not gon' let it slide
[00:51.90]Now she see me up she let me f**k
[00:53.60]Want me to cum inside
[00:54.96]Broski going dumb hopped in the car he said he down to ride
[00:58.13]You a little pup stop playing tough ain't make no sacrifice
[01:01.19]Yeah smokin' cookie for my appetite
[01:04.18]I don't trust nobody people talking and be telling lies
[01:07.09]We just wanna win and shock them all and catch 'em by surprise
[01:09.96]I was saucin' down until we up and then we all rise yeah
[01:13.97]But niggas don't stick to the G-code balling on my haters
[01:16.99]I think that I'm stuck in beast mode
[01:19.07]Make it through the foul run to the line and make the free throw
[01:21.93]I think that I'm D. Rose do 'em like I'm Deebo
[01:24.84]
[01:25.45]Aye but I like to fade away
[01:27.53]I got these diamonds on me and these b***hes all in my face
[01:30.30]And you wanna be a star and you wanna win the race
[01:33.13]But you cannot rock with me 'cause I was caught on the chase
[01:36.20]Both：
[01:36.55]Nowadays I'm too cool for a girlfriend
[01:39.50]Nowadays I don't know when the world spins
[01:42.43]Live your life like we die when the world ends
[01:45.42]So it's alright every time we f**kin' break a sin
[01:48.18]
[01:48.70]Nowadays sh*t's not the same
[01:50.58]
[01:51.21]Life switched lanes now these hoes act strange
[01:54.13]And I lost my grip on the world in bliss
[01:56.67]It's so it's so
[01:58.47]
[01:59.35]Landon Cube：
[01:59.91]I think it's so damn strange what these people be saying
[02:02.62]I can never even listen to a word that they say
[02:05.56]I'm on the west side that's the best side
[02:08.45]
[02:09.67]By the cliff smoking blicks that's the best high
[02:12.04]
[02:13.13]And I got a shawty with the best eyes
[02:15.49]Talking sh*t girl why you putting up a fight
[02:18.25]I'm in my own world far from the satellites
[02:21.39]They want my information they get no conversation
[02:24.33]'Cause nowadays everybody calling
[02:26.68]I need a manager 'cause I can't really f**k with nobody
[02:29.63]
[02:31.36]I can't really f**k with nobody so
[02:36.34]Lil Skies：
[02:37.44]Aye but I like to fade away
[02:39.47]I got these diamonds on me and these b**ches all in my face
[02:42.30]And you wanna be a star and you wanna win the race
[02:45.29]But you cannot rock with me 'cause I was caught on the chase
[02:47.95]
[02:48.52]Nowadays I'm too cool for a girlfriend
[02:51.50]Nowadays I don't know when the world spins
[02:54.46]Live your life like we die when the world ends
[02:57.43]So it's alright every time we f**kin' break a sin
data.trans:
[ti:Nowadays (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Skies/Landon Cube]
[al:Life of a Dark Rose]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.34]//
[00:01.91]感谢CashMoneyAP
[00:03.28]
[00:22.59]//
[00:24.06]//
[00:24.51]现在的我 并不适合谈情说爱
[00:27.51]现在的我 甚至不知道今夕是何年
[00:30.48]好好生活吧 让我们尽情绽放 直到生命的最后一刻
[00:33.32]这样就好 让我们打破一切束缚
[00:36.12]
[00:36.72]现在一切都变得不同
[00:39.11]现在我功成名就 昔日看不起我的女孩 现在都想回到我身边
[00:41.93]我已分不清真假
[00:44.64]这就是现实 这就是现实
[00:46.62]//
[00:47.19]来自东海岸的我 如此孤单
[00:48.99]我从不放任自己 我谨守初心
[00:51.90]现在 她看到我功成名就 想要和我尽情缠绵
[00:53.60]想要和我纵情欢愉
[00:54.96]Broski对此早已麻木 他与她尽情缠绵 纵情欢愉
[00:58.13]不要这样游戏人生 
[01:01.19]吞云吐雾 随心所欲
[01:04.18]我不相信任何人 人们滔滔不绝 谎言百出
[01:07.09]我们只想获得胜利 震撼他们 出其不意地超越他们
[01:09.96]我曾历尽艰难 终于功成名就 现在我们都已崛起
[01:13.97]但朋友 不要试图让我喜欢我的敌人
[01:16.99]否则我会抓狂
[01:19.07]我会拼尽全力 得到三分球
[01:21.93]我想我就是D. Rose 我像Deebo那样 所向披靡
[01:24.84]
[01:25.45]但我感到有些无聊
[01:27.53]我有无数钻石 那些女孩们对我垂涎不已
[01:30.30]你想要成为一名明星 还是你想赢得比赛
[01:33.13]但现在我不能和你一起尽情摇摆了 因为我被媒体发现了 我要尽快离去
[01:36.20]//
[01:36.55]现在的我 并不适合谈情说爱
[01:39.50]现在的我 甚至不知道今夕是何年
[01:42.43]好好生活吧 让我们尽情绽放 直到生命的最后一刻
[01:45.42]这样就好 让我们打破一切束缚
[01:48.18]
[01:48.70]现在一切都变得不同
[01:50.58]
[01:51.21]现在我功成名就 昔日看不起我的女孩 现在都想回到我身边
[01:54.13]我已分不清真假
[01:56.67]这就是现实 这就是现实
[01:58.47]
[01:59.35]//
[01:59.91]有时候人们的言语真的十分莫名其妙
[02:02.62]我真是一个字都不想听
[02:05.56]我如今在西区 这里真不错
[02:08.45]
[02:09.67]在悬崖边吞云吐雾 这种感觉真不错
[02:12.04]
[02:13.13]我认识一个女孩 她有双迷人的眼睛
[02:15.49]让我们尽情缠绵吧 女孩 你为何不愿意呢
[02:18.25]我沉沦于自己的世界 
[02:21.39]他们想要了解我的信息 但却无法联系到我
[02:24.33]因次现在 人们都说
[02:26.68]我需要一名经纪人 因为我不擅长处理和媒体之间的关系
[02:29.63]
[02:31.36]我确实还不习惯处理这些关系
[02:36.34]//
[02:37.44]但我感到有些无聊
[02:39.47]我有无数钻石 那些女孩们对我垂涎不已
[02:42.30]你想要成为一名明星 或者你想赢得比赛
[02:45.29]但现在我不能和你一起尽情摇摆了 因为我被媒体发现了 我要尽快离去
[02:47.95]
[02:48.52]现在的我 并不适合谈情说爱
[02:51.50]现在的我 甚至不知道今夕是何年
[02:54.46]好好生活吧 让我们尽情绽放 直到生命的最后一刻
[02:57.43]这样就好 让我们打破一切束缚
